mapper.insert: INSERT INTO faq_info ( faq_id, faq_category_code, multilingual_content, attachment_no, status_code, system_timestamp, created_depart, created_by, created_date, created_time, updated_depart, updated_by, updated_date, updated_time ) VALUES ( #{faqId}, #{faqCategoryCode}, CAST(#{multilingualContent} AS JSONB), #{attachmentNo}, #{statusCode.code}, #{systemTimestamp}, #{createdDepart}, #{createdBy}, #{createdDate}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedDepart}, #{updatedBy}, #{updatedDate}, #{updatedTime} )
